name: stt-app
description: Speech to Text Application with RAG and Summarization

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:backend:coverage && npm run test:frontend:coverage
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && black --check app/ && flake8 app/
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:backend:fix && npm run lint:frontend:fix
scripts.lint:backend:fix: cd backend && black app/ && isort app/
